episodes.title: How One Teacher Created a Fascist Cult in 5 Days..... #cultdocumentaries #highschool #dictator
episodes.description:
What happens when an ordinary high school teacher decides to show his students how easy it is to fall into fascism? 

In 1967, Ron Jones ran a shocking social experiment called The Third Wave—and in just five days, his students turned from carefree teens to obedient, unquestioning followers of an invented movement.

This isn’t fiction. It actually happened.

This psychological experiment spiraled out of control, revealing how frighteningly easy it is to manipulate minds—and how even smart, well-meaning people can be pulled into dangerous ideologies.

In today’s video, we break down the eerie real-life story of The Third Wave, its disturbing consequences, and what it says about you, me, and how easily we obey.

Welcome to Wired Weird—where strange science meets haunting psychology.

If you’re into creepy case studies, unnerving social experiments, and the twisted side of human behavior, you’ve found your internet rabbit hole.

👁️ Stay weird. Stay awake.
